column4: HI all of sudden I cannot connect to my router as well at my college any help
have you done a ping test?
sure
how about you?
how fast?
you have a very nice service what are you using?
you are communicating at a very high speed
64bytes at 1ns - wow
what did you ping?
I want you to try and ping google, "ping www.google.com" and tell me the results
how are you on irc at #ubuntu?
so you are only having problems with a wifi problem?
you can ping the schools router at 1ns 64bytes etc.?
with the wifi?
if you can ping the router with the laptop quickly, and you can then it sounds to me either 1. a firewall on the laptop or 2. you no longer have the right essid and/or password.
are you sure, if you can use internet/irc with the desktop then there has to be something stopping the connection, but your wifi is obviously working perfectly.  So there seems only 2 possibilities.
what port are you connecting to the router on?
have you used it for another wireless setup before?
all ports are open, on both the router and laptop, and you are sure of this.
are you using firestarter for your firewall?

I have had problems before with firestarter.  It will say that I have killed it and it is off but it is still working, this is funny but try removing it for a little while - if you can without worry too much about security
